# Class GraphBuilder

Main graph builder class for creating complete graph configurations. Provides a fluent API for building graphs with nodes, edges, components, and subgraphs.

#### Example


```
const graph = new Graph('my_graph')  .addComponent(llmComponent)  .addComponent(embedderComponent)  .addNode(intentNode)  .addNode(llmNode)  .addEdge(intentNode, llmNode)  .setStartNode(intentNode)  .setEndNode(llmNode)  .build();

```


##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

addComponent addEdge addIntentSubgraph addNode addSubgraph build setEndNode setEndNodes setStartNode setStartNodes

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new GraphBuilder(opts: string | [GraphBuilderProps](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_dsl.GraphBuilderProps)): [GraphBuilder]()

Creates a new graph builder. Accepts either an options object or a graph ID string.

#### Parameters

    * opts: string | [GraphBuilderProps](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_dsl.GraphBuilderProps)

Graph builder options or graph ID string

#### Returns [GraphBuilder]()

### addComponent

  * addComponent(component: [Component](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Component) | [AbstractComponent](./graph_dsl_components_abstract_component.AbstractComponent)): this

Adds a component to the graph configuration.

#### Parameters

    * component: [Component](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Component) | [AbstractComponent](./graph_dsl_components_abstract_component.AbstractComponent)

Component to add to the graph

#### Returns this

The graph instance for method chaining




### addEdge

  * addEdge(  
fromNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode),  
toNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode),  
options?: {  
condition?: CustomEdgeConditionReference | [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_EdgeConditionExecutor.EdgeConditionCallback);  
conditionExpression?: string;  
loop?: boolean;  
optional?: boolean;  
},  
): this

Adds an edge connecting two nodes in the graph.

#### Parameters

    * fromNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

Source node

    * toNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

Destination node

    * `Optional`options: {  
condition?: CustomEdgeConditionReference | [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_EdgeConditionExecutor.EdgeConditionCallback);  
conditionExpression?: string;  
loop?: boolean;  
optional?: boolean;  
}

Optional edge configuration

      * ##### `Optional`condition?: CustomEdgeConditionReference | [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_EdgeConditionExecutor.EdgeConditionCallback)

Reference to a registered custom condition or a callback to register one

      * ##### `Optional`conditionExpression?: string

CEL expression for conditional execution

      * ##### `Optional`loop?: boolean

Whether the edge creates a loop

      * ##### `Optional`optional?: boolean

Whether the edge is optional

#### Returns this

The builder instance for method chaining




### addIntentSubgraph

  * addIntentSubgraph(id: string, parameters: IntentSubgraphProps): [GraphBuilder]()

Adds an intent subgraph to the graph.

#### Parameters

    * id: string

Unique identifier for the subgraph

    * parameters: IntentSubgraphProps

Intent subgraph parameters

      * ##### intents

Array of intent configurations

      * ##### promptTemplate

Template for LLM prompting

      * ##### llmComponent

LLM component instance or configuration

      * ##### embedderComponent

Embedder component instance or configuration

      * ##### similarityThreshold

Similarity threshold for matching

      * ##### textGenerationConfig

Text generation configuration

      * ##### maxIntentsForLLM

Maximum intents to send to LLM

      * ##### maxPhrasesPerIntent

Maximum phrases per intent

      * ##### embeddingSimilarityThreshold

Embedding similarity threshold

      * ##### topNIntents

Number of top intents to return

#### Returns [GraphBuilder]()

The graph instance for method chaining




### addNode

  * addNode(node: [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)): this

Adds a node to the graph. If an [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode) is provided without corresponding component, internal components are automatically added.

#### Parameters

    * node: [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

Node to add to the graph

#### Returns this

The graph instance for method chaining




### addSubgraph

  * addSubgraph(subgraph: [SubgraphBuilder](./graph_dsl_graph_config_dsl.SubgraphBuilder)): this

Adds a subgraph to the graph configuration.

#### Parameters

    * subgraph: [SubgraphBuilder](./graph_dsl_graph_config_dsl.SubgraphBuilder)

Subgraph builder instance to be added

#### Returns this

The graph instance for method chaining




### build

  * build(): [Graph](./graph_graph.Graph)

Creates a graph executor instance for running the graph.

#### Returns [Graph](./graph_graph.Graph)

GraphExecutor instance configured with this graph
